tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections (
    election_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_id UUID,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR,
    influencer_name VARCHAR,
    posts_count INT,
    post_engagement INT
)

CREATE TABLE election_influencers (
    influencer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    influencer_handle VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    platform_id INT REFERENCES social_media_platform(platform_id),
    followers_count INT,
    posts_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE socialmedia_influence (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 election_id INT,
 social_media_platform VARCHAR,
 influence_score FLOAT
 )

CREATE TABLE elections (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 election_name VARCHAR,
 election_date DATE,
 winning_party VARCHAR
 )

CREATE TABLE government_agencies (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 agency_name VARCHAR,
 headquarters_location VARCHAR
 )

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_date DATE NOT NULL,
    platform_id INT,
    agency_id INT,
    election_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES Social_Media_Platforms(platform_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES Government_Agencies(agency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (election_id) REFERENCES Elections(election_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id)
);
